value: Re-watchers, NO SPOILERS, please. Thank you.
nice opening theme. fits the drama so well
This is just so good. I don't think I'll ever find another drama like this. <3
Im worried about Jingrui and Lin Shu, can they still be friends after this?
in just one night two families were torn down
on one's birthday. what a present
Happy Birthday Jingrui :(
My heart breaks for this poor kid.
This poor guy has three fathers now
The show's not done yet. There may be even more dads up ahead.
@LC Lmao this is why i love comments
@lc LOL he has many fathers now. dunno if it's unfortunate or fortunate that he can have three families to fall back on
<
dads are 2 traitors and 1 enemy King smh
Lol
jing rui ....sob
but gotta feel bad for jingrui. the world he knew of shattered like that just in one night
Are these comments live
is this the family ancestral site??
yes，it is
but how could you have shielded him in the first place huh
this guy is crazy
because the only solution is to kill yourself, as your wife convinces you to do so
so complicated
he raped you and you are defending this monster...wow...
I guess 20 years of marriage makes you love someone even though he raped you? wat
im sure she hated and feared him but 20 years is a long time and they had 2 kids their r/elationship must be v. complex
What a faithful wife. Sad~!
Don't trust him. He'll make it look like suicide.
there are so many complicated emotions going on here ... wow
How can you be devoted to a man who raped you.
Rape?! When did that happen?
im confused. does the wife truly loves him for what he has done. i know they have been married for 20 years but...
I don't know how she ever forgave him for raping her...seriously....
I really like XieYu for this moment.He loves her no matter what happened.The actor is really good so I can't hate him
i think she cares for him since things can change in 20 years. Plus, we only assumed he raped her
But I don't think she loves loves him, just cares for him, afterall they do have 2 biological kids together
She probably said all that because she's being a faithful wife
@ LC i know right? and she was pregnant too at the time. Stockholm syndrome i guess
Nah, you just lost your damn marbles.
im guessing 20 years of affection can cover your husband drugging you and taking advantage of it a forced marriage.
her face is like, he doesn't know when to give it up why did i even try
Damn, this guy don't know when to quit
Yup she is just going to save the kids
i really love Xieyu'actor, he performed so well!!!
ur on your own dude...
For all its worth, suicide is by far the most stupid thing to do in any situation or circumstances. Xie Yu has a point.
This is not only a crappy birthday party, but a shitty present too.. Smh..
one birthday to rememberfor years. jingrui had the most unforgettable present one can have
Reminds of my eighteenth birthday when I cried like a bitch. It was a shitty birthday
PFFFTTT. YEAH HE HAS.
how not so subtle lol
Yes of course lol
I love watching these two, their friendship is something to be envied.
@LC agreed

he has good intuition for once

Jingrui's wish was to sever ties with Xie who was using the Zhuo family. He got his wish.
the boy's father is a king...future looks bright to me.
So defensive LOL
mmm don't be so obvious brother meng. you're being so defensive over su zhe lol
come on guys! You and Nihuang are so bad at keeping your relation to Lin Shu on the down low lol
so not obvious
Yep Can't bully Su Zhe in front of Meng Da Ge or Nihuang! lol
Comm Meng and NiHuang so defensive when it comes to Su, lol
@lc lol right. these two are protective over him. if this continues sooner or later they will be exposed
su zhe is like please don't be so obvious brother meng. and prince jing, okbye don't wanna argue anymore.
brother meng like the big bro who can't help but be by his cared one side
but Meng just worries about you so.... Love how everyone gets crazy defensive over him. Cant wait til its Jings turn
i love brother meng
aw... Meng da ge!
lol frustrated

bet he feels guilty a little for the innocents he crushed in his plan
all of you he means the more horrible things u do. the more your heart gets used to it. the less guilty u feel
